pr_title: [RW-5060][RISK=LOW]  DataSetController - reduce number of args passed to dataSetService#saveDataSet

timeline.message:
Fix Api test : Add null or Empty check for data set version
;

timeline.bodyText:
I had to delete this otherwise DataSetMapper was using this method for the method  DbDataset dataSetRequestToDb(DataSetRequest dataSetRequest);
and then starting throwing exception (for each attribute)  "lastModifiedTIME" not found did you mean null
timeline.author: NehaBroad

timeline.bodyText: I think you need to revert this block and leave the code the way it was for purposes of how the rename has to work. This will be a breaking change to the rename dataset.
timeline.author: freemabd

replies.bodyText: We need to add a test case for the dataset rename that would have caught this type of code change. Don't have to do it in this PR.
replies.author: freemabd

replies.bodyText: Is this because rename just going to send the name and id and not the cohort/Concept Ids ? If yes should i add a comment /TODO to remove this once we will introduce a new endpoint?
replies.author: NehaBroad

replies.bodyText: Correct. And this was the fix... so we didn't need a new endpoint.
replies.author: freemabd

timeline.author: freemabd

timeline.bodyText: Remove this and use qualifiedByName above. This method exists in CommonMappers.
timeline.author: freemabd

timeline.bodyText: Can we add a test case for this in DataSetMapperTest?
timeline.author: freemabd
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -37,17 +42,47 @@
   @Named("dbModelToClientLight")
   DataSet dbModelToClientLight(DbDataset dbDataset);
 
+  @Mapping(target = "dataSetId", ignore = true)
+  @Mapping(target = "version", source = "etag")
+  @Mapping(target = "creatorId", ignore = true)
+  @Mapping(target = "creationTime", ignore = true)
+  @Mapping(target = "invalid", ignore = true)
+  @Mapping(target = "lastModifiedTime", ignore = true)
+  @Mapping(target = "prePackagedConceptSetEnum", ignore = true)
+  @Mapping(target = "values", source = "domainValuePairs")
+  DbDataset dataSetRequestToDb(DataSetRequest dataSetRequest);
